title: Apple Channel Store Advisor, Prague (fixed-term contract)
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — we craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that supports the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. The role is internally known as an Apple Staff in Channel (ASC), and you are the link between our future customers and our products. You’ll be responsible for crafting an extraordinary experience, and you’ll help build a network of committed Apple customers! You’ll showcase your ambitious spirit as you lead the sales, merchandising, and operations of an Apple Shop within a consumer electronics store. In addition, you’ll encourage our retail partner’s staff through your visionary style, love for technology, and passion about Apple every single day! In this role, you are a dynamic leader, business manager and influencer based within a multi branded retail shop. The role's purpose is to grow the Apple product and add-on business in the shop and will be held accountable for performance by providing excellent customer service, giving product demonstrations, and ensuring all Apple fixtures and merchandising elements are up to date and maintained according to Apple’s standards. You’ll be crafting an extraordinary experience, and help build a network of committed Apple customers. In addition, you’ll encourage our retail partner’s staff through your forward-thinking style, love for technology, and passion about Apple every single day. The role's purpose is to grow the Apple product and add-on business in the shop and will be held accountable for performance by providing excellent customer service, giving product demonstrations, and ensuring all Apple fixtures and merchandising elements are up to date and maintained. This role is internally called an Apple Solutions Consultant.
description: You ensure delivery of outstanding Apple customer experiences within your store through close engagement and partnership across all levels of the Reseller store team. Educate and encourage Reseller store teams to stay knowledgeable on the latest Apple product and services portfolio. You coach, recognise and mentor the teams. Run and grow the business in your store to achieve targets by analyzing results and sharing insights on a weekly, monthly and quarterly basis. Ensure Apple’s distinct dedication to merchandising perfection is delivered throughout your store.
key_qualifications: You are passionate to deliver outstanding customer experiences, are approachable and know how to deeply connect with customers. You understand that to be effective, you discuss customers needs and values and how they intend to use Apple's products and services. You align all of this information and recognise that each customer is different. Apple does not cut corners, in products or in business. You bring the highest level of integrity, honesty, and accountability in all that you do. You are open to feedback and can relate well to all kinds of people. When faced with a challenging opportunity, you know who to connect with and when. People know you as a true collaborator who knows what it takes to win. We believe that communication is key to success. You actively listen and discuss the possibilities with customers and teammates alike. You know how to build advocacy with store staff and key partners within the store through communication, collaboration and training. You create excitement and support for the brand with partner staff. Fluency in Czech or Slovak and English.
additional_requirements: Apple is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity.
